trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_SEQ_00<tab>The researcher Claudian could use an adventurer's assistance in dispatching some bothersome birds.

TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_SEQ_01<tab>Winged purveyors of death and destruction are wreaking havoc with Claudian's investigation of the ruins. Set handmade scarecrows at the specified locations in Highbridge.
TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_SEQ_02<tab>The scarecrows have been placed. Inform Claudian that the avian pests will disrupt his research no more.
TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_SEQ_03<tab>Now free to immerse himself in his research, Claudian thanks you for your assistance.
TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_TODO_00<tab>Set handmade scarecrows at the specified locations.
TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_CLAUDIEN_000_000<tab>Do <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> look down, Claudian! You must not, you will not, you <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var>not look─aaaaaahhh!

TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_CLAUDIEN_000_001<tab>By the Twelve, my good <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, you frightened me half to death! But you must forgive me: I've been a bit restless of late, what with those winged nightmares swooping in from every which direction, pecking and poking and pricking at me.

TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_CLAUDIEN_000_002<tab>I might as well pack up my instruments and go home, as I won't be getting an onze of research done. If, however, a kind adventurer like yourself were to use these scarecrows to drive the birds away, it would be another story. What do you say?

TEXT_GAIUSA407_00749_CLAUDIEN_000_020<tab>Do <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> look─oh, you've seen to the birds, have you? Splendid work, friend! Now to head back down and return to my research. Er, worry not, I'll be along any moment now─be on your way.
